item.title: Coding4Performance 2: Asynchronous development and background tasks
item.description: In this post I will explain the general concept of asynchronous development and background tasks. So everyone knows how procedural development works. In Business Central it starts with a user which logs in to the web client and starts a user session. The first page which opens is most likely the role center page. Behind the scenes now every part runs some code and loads some data. Typically this happens from top to bottom.
